title: Pessat tips
content:
Hey guys I'm gonna write pessat soon can I get some tips
On where all to focus and important stuff more to concentrate

comments.body: This Year there's Negative Marking in PESSAT right

Focus mainly on the syllabus for math, physics and chemistry. But especially the physics and math of the chemistry. And while you're at it maybe also take a look at the chemistry of math and physics. Finally you should never forget to keep in mind the mathematical approach to understanding the physical features of chemical physiology.
yep, 0.25 marks for every negative answer
Also don't forget to look up for mathematical physics approach to chemistry
